name: SocialDeterminantsOfHealthScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Social Determinants of Health Screening Assessments Questions
description: Not all SDOH domains will have LOINC codes for screening assessment instrument questions. Those value sets will be added to this group once they are available.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for all SDOH domains as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for all SDOH domains.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)
